Kanelo nokautirao Kovaljova za svetsku titulu
Meksikanac postao šampion u četvrtoj različitoj kategoriji

03 Nov 2019

Blistava karijera Saula Alvareza, u bokserskom svetu poznat po nadimku Kanelo (cimet), nastavlja se i u kategoriji više. Meksički bokser, jedan od najplaćenijih sportista današnjice, oprobao se u poluteškoj kategoriji i u borbi meseca je pobedio sjajnog rusa Sergeja Kovaljova i to nokautom u 11. rundi.
Sve do tog momenta bila je to izjednačena borba, Kovaljov se trudio da odbranu svoju titulu prvaka sveta u WBO verziji poluteške kategorije, ali jedan aperkat ga je pogodio u bradu i spasa mu nije bilo. Alvarezu je bio dovoljan još jedan udarac da završi meč, da obori Rusa na pod i da mu preotme šampionski pojas.
Prema bodovanju sudija, Kanelo je imao malu bodovnu prednost pre nokauta. Njegov uspeh je tim veći što je morao da za ovu borbu preskoči dve kategorije, da bi izazvao Kovaljova. Sada je 29-ogodišnji Meksikanac osvojio šampionske pojaseve u četiri različite težinske kategorije.
Alvarez je bilans u karijeri popravio na 54 pobede, od kojih 37 nokautom, uz dva nerešena meča i jedan poraz, od Flojda Mejvedera džuniora. S druge strane, Kovaljov je pretrpeo četvrti poraz u 39 mečeva, a sva četiri je doživeo u poslednjih osam borbi, što znači da je njegova zvezda u silaznoj putanji.
Prema procenama bokserskih stručnjaka, vrlo verovatno je da će Saul Alvarez uskoro treći put ukrstiti rukavice sa Genadijem Golovkinom, sa kojim je odboksovao dva veoma tesna meča. Jedan je završen nerešeno, a drugi je Meksikanac dobio podeljenom odlukom sudija.



Foto: Reuters

Canelo knocked out Kovalyov for the world title
The Mexican became the champion in the fourth different category

03 Nov 2019

Saul Alvarez's brilliant career, in the boxing world known by the nickname Canelo (cinnamon), continues in the higher category. The Mexican boxer, one of the highest paid athletes of the day, tested himself in the semi-lightweight category and beat Sergei Kovalyov, a brilliant rusher, by knockout in round 11 of the month.
Until that moment, it was an even fight, Kovalyov struggled to defend his world championship title in the WBO semi-heavyweight category, but an uppercut hit him in the chin and he had no escape. Alvarez had enough of a shot to finish the match, knock the Russians to the floor and retrieve his championship belt.
According to the judges, Kanelo had a small scoring advantage before the knockout. His success is all the greater because he had to skip two categories for this fight to challenge Kovalyov. Now the 29-year-old Mexican has won championship belts in four different weight classes.
Alvarez improved his career record to 54 wins, 37 of which were knocked out, with two draws and one defeat by Floyd Mayweather Junior. On the other hand, Kovalyov suffered his fourth defeat in 39 matches, all four of which he has experienced in his last eight fights, which means that his star is in a downward direction.
According to boxing experts, it is very likely that Saul Alvarez will soon cross the gloves for the third time with Genadi Golovkin, with whom he has boxed off two very tight matches. One was completed and the other was awarded to a Mexican by a split decision.
